NF.Q: Which bars have TWh values exceed 4589.50 TWh? Please list the bars and corresponding TWh values?

NC.Q: Which is larger, Wind or Natural Gas
NC.A: The value of the {Natural Gas} is larger?

NC.Q: Which is larger, Wind, Diesel or Hydrogen

NC.Q: Which is larger, Petroleum, Gasoline, Wind or Electricity

MSR.A: There are {5} bars with values above the average.

MSR.Q: Which pair of adjacent bars has the largest difference in values?
MSR.A: The pair of adjacent bars with the largest difference is between {Nuclear} and {Solar}.

MSR.Q: Which three categories have the highest combined values?
MSR.A: The three categories with the highest combined values are: {Solar}, {Biofuel}, and {Diesel}.

VA.Q: Sort the bars by TWh values in descending order and list the labels from left to right.
VA.A: Sorted by TWh value descending: {Solar}, {Biofuel}, {Diesel}, {Biomass}, {Petroleum}, {Hydro}, {Natural Gas}, {Gasoline}, {Wind}, {Hydrogen}, {Nuclear}, and {Electricity}.

VA.Q: Sort the bars by TWh values in ascending order and list the labels from left to right.
VA.A: Sorted by TWh value ascending: {Electricity}, {Nuclear}, {Hydrogen}, {Wind}, {Gasoline}, {Natural Gas}, {Hydro}, {Petroleum}, {Biomass}, {Diesel}, {Biofuel}, and {Solar}.
